about.title: About Me
about.description1: Passionate Full-Stack Developer and Quality Assurance Engineer with over a decade of experience in building scalable web applications, ensuring software quality, and driving data-driven business decisions.
about.description2: My expertise spans across modern web technologies, automated testing frameworks, business intelligence, and CRM management. I thrive on solving complex problems and creating innovative solutions that deliver real business value.
about.description3: When I'm not coding or testing, you'll find me exploring new technologies, gaming, or contributing to open-source projects. I believe in continuous learning and staying ahead of the technology curve.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: A journey through diverse roles and technologies, building expertise across the full software development lifecycle.

crm.title: CRM Consultant - MSQL Report Writer
crm.description: Leading CRM management and business intelligence initiatives, specializing in workflow automation and data-driven reporting solutions.
responsibilities: Manage and optimize ClientSpace CRM platform for enhanced business operations
Design and configure complex workflows to streamline business processes
Develop automated reporting systems using MSQL for executive decision-making
Provide technical support and training to team members and clients
Build custom API integrations and tailored solutions for client needs

webdev.title: Junior Web Developer & Quality Tester
webdev.description: Developed responsive web applications and implemented comprehensive testing strategies for Belgian clients, focusing on front-end technologies and quality assurance.
responsibilities: Built interactive web applications using React, Vue.js, and vanilla JavaScript
Implemented DOM manipulation and dynamic user interface features
Conducted exploratory and automated testing using Cypress framework
Performed API testing and validation using Postman with automated test suites
Created optimized landing pages with custom questionnaire functionalities

qa.title: Global Quality Analyst & Reporter
qa.description: Specialized in quality assurance methodologies, test automation, and business intelligence reporting using enterprise-grade tools and frameworks.
responsibilities: Designed and executed comprehensive manual and automated testing strategies
Created dynamic QA forms and procedures for standardized testing processes
Developed SSRS reports for management insights and quality metrics tracking
Implemented data validation processes and deployment procedures
Performed advanced data analysis to identify trends and improvement opportunities

scheduler.title: Scheduler & Reporter
scheduler.description: Managed workforce scheduling, data analysis, and strategic planning for telecommunications operations with a focus on service level optimization.
responsibilities: Analyzed operational data to optimize workforce scheduling and resource allocation
Maintained service level agreements through strategic planning and forecasting
Created comprehensive reports for management decision-making processes
Developed forecasting models to predict staffing needs and operational requirements

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Comprehensive computer engineering program with focus on software development, data structures, algorithms, and system design principles.
